section.title: Directory structure
section.para: The IronJacamar container has the following directory structure:

itemizedlist.listitem: bin: Contains the scripts that starts the container.
config: Contains the configuration of the container.
lib: Contains all the libraries needed by the container.
log: Contains the log files for the container.

section.title: JBoss Application Server
section.para: The IronJacamar provides the Java EE Connector Architecture (JCA) container for JBoss Application Server 7 and future versions.

The container can be updated in the JBoss Application Server by using the as-upgrader.sh script in the doc/as directory. This will allow an easy installation of IronJacamar patch releases to fix bugs in the application server environment.
